body_html:
Ohai. I may have just fixed no. 2 ☺️

If no. 1 was reported as being annoying during the summer we should definitely fix it. It would be super-nice if you could work on that, Maud. Especially because I have no idea about devise's internals 😁

body:
Ohai. I may have just fixed no. 2 :relaxed: 

If no. 1 was reported as being annoying during the summer we should definitely fix it. It would be super-nice if you could work on that, Maud. Especially because I have no idea about devise's internals :grin:
